TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIScrollViewAccessibilityDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Foundation.NSAttributedString GetAccessibilityAttributedScrollStatus (this UIKit.IUIScrollViewAccessibilityDelegate This, UIKit.UIScrollView scrollView);

.method public static hidebysig class Foundation.NSAttributedString GetAccessibilityAttributedScrollStatus(class UIKit.IUIScrollViewAccessibilityDelegate This, class UIKit.UIScrollView scrollView) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.
The scrollview for which to get the attributed status.
Docs.summary: Gets an attributed string that represents the current relative progress through a document or collection of documents. (For example, "Volume 34 of 51.")

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetAccessibilityScrollStatus (this UIKit.IUIScrollViewAccessibilityDelegate This, UIKit.UIScrollView scrollView);
